item.title: #en @ 1457462305583681537
item.description: This is the tool that we used to calculate all the travel time isochrones you can see here. That was a nice project where the #opendata we released was re-used by local public health teams to improve their vaccination advice for people without cars. 💪👍https://t.co/d7KWXGTZQJ https://t.co/XSh5RKm1Wl

item.title: #es @ 1457461416076750858
item.description:
La web del Ayuntamiento de #Leganés está tan mal estructurada y tiene tantos recovecos que es capaz de decirte una cosa y la contraria.
Tan pronto el portal de 'open data' está en desarrollo desde 2018, como tienes un portal de transparencia desarrollado desde 2019 https://t.co/v4Z8GZrUXe

item.title: #es @ 1457206440041517058
item.description:
NO hay ligero incremento de fallecidos por #COVID19
Aprendamos a NO sacar conclusiones con los "reportes" diarios del MINSA, sino más bien en revisar los #datosAbiertos por fecha de defunción, los cuales indican que el promedio diario está por debajo de 30 desde hace UN mes https://t.co/oMqvQDErCw https://t.co/cFcztMwDvY

item.title: #en @ 1457201969689419783
item.description:
I catch a flight in 4 hours and can’t fall asleep because I’m thinking about:
1. NFT analytics. In an ocean of open data, what tools can be helpful to identify trends amongst holders
2. Photography NFTs. How to onboard one of the most talented photographers I’ve ever seen

item.title: #en @ 1457077972272287746
item.description: Day 6, Red. Red is not as popular a colour for passenger cars in Mainland Finland as it used to be. Still, at the end of 2020 it was the second most common colour after grey. The third most common colour was black. #30DayMapChallenge Source: Traficom, Open data for vehicles https://t.co/g7S10dbvRu

item.title: #en @ 1457056667066150915
item.description:
We have grown our analyst team 5x this year AND added 100+ analysts in our Hub.
Still, infrastructure lags price.
You can help us scale by 1) referring analysts or joining our Hub, 2) commissioning independent research through the Hub, 3) investing in other open data sources.

item.description: @abisze @bmsgpk Ist das der Sinn eines Dashboards: Die relevanten Daten in einem Open Data-File zu verstecken? Nur als Idee: Wie wäre es auf der Startseite mit: Impf-Fortschritt gesamt u. nach Dosis sowie Anteil der Geimpften/Ungeimpften an Neuinfektionen/Krankenhaus/Intensiv/Todesfällen? Danke!

item.title: #en @ 1456990384584859775
item.description:
Web3 is getting close to 0->1. Once there, it will go 1->60 in a blur.
This week I've tried 3 Web3-Notion-like apps. Each has a different killer feature built on open data. No 2yr wait for a partial API. They will be customized, reimagined, and extended breathtakingly fast.

item.title: #en @ 1456923076222914562
item.description:
#30DayMapChallenge Day 6 - Red Red is "rood" (noun) or "rode" (adjective) in Dutch. The map shows places with rood or rode in their names, selected from #OpenStreetMap #OpenData using #QGIS.
However, often these toponyms have nothing to do with red. 1/3 https://t.co/RAflvkNL0z

item.title: #fr @ 1456922518380482561
item.description: Vous savez pourquoi ce qui se passe au sein de l’état ( central / collectivités) n’est pas en OPEN DATA ? Parce que t̶o̶u̶t̶ ̶l̶e̶ ̶m̶o̶n̶d̶e̶ beaucoup se sucrent au passage et c’est aussi pour ça qu’on paye une blinde d’impôts … la taille même de l’état génère la corruption.

item.title: #ja @ 1456625099960848390
item.description:
【2021年11月04日 関東・中部地方の火山性地震】
草津白根山（白根山（湯釜付近））3回 (11/2 3回) 浅間山 3回 (11/1 4回) 御嶽山 1回→ 白山 6回 7少⤵︎ 富士山 ※高周波地震 1回3↘︎ 箱根山 2回※注 (10/26 3回) 伊豆東部火山群 1回 (11/2 1回)

item.title: #en @ 1456383874020356099
item.description:
@cameron @elonmusk @DrEliDavid “Show us your transaction ledger” is the new “show us your tax returns”
But really, the UN, the WHO, and essentially any organization serving the “world” should have open data and public transaction ledgers for the sake of solving problems and being transparent.
